documents.document: This has to be Boyata's last game for Celtic. Simunovic been terrible lately too. Lustig been past it for a while and none of them have any confidence in Gordon
Think our players have slipped at least once a minute here

Me all week: finally a Saturday with absolutely nothing to do! Cannot wait to laze about for the whole day
Saturday lunchtime: I AM BORED AND DEPRESSED AS FUCK!
